name: Reigning (itch)
description:
This game was made in under an hour to share some wisdom with a friend. As such, it is very simplistic. With each death the platforms are randomized. It took me 23 tries to beat my own game.

We're each challenged every day to push forward without always knowing where we'll end up. The number of failures we have often outweigh our successes, but with each failure is an opportunity to learn and improve. Persistence will see us through.

Controls:
WASD = Movement
Mouse = Look Left/Right (You can't always look before you leap!)
Space = Jump
Escape = Exit
Tilde (~) = Console > enter 'fly' and 'walk' if you just want to just fly over to the end.
